name: Multiple Security Vulnerabilities Across Files
expected_findings: Command injection vulnerability in execute_command via os.system with unsanitized user input
Insecure deserialization using pickle.load in load_data which can execute arbitrary code
Path traversal vulnerability in read_user_file allowing access to arbitrary files
Path traversal vulnerability in delete_file allowing deletion of arbitrary files
No path sanitization in read_user_file and delete_file
Missing error handling in all methods
Missing docstrings for both classes and all methods
Missing error handling in delete_file for file not found or permission errors
Missing test coverage for execute_command including command injection attempts
Missing test coverage for load_data including malicious pickle payloads
Missing test coverage for read_user_file including path traversal attempts, file not found, permission errors
Missing test coverage for delete_file including path traversal attempts, file not found, permission errors
